title: Public Health (Notifiable Infectious and Formidable Epidemic Disease) (Declaration) Notice, 2014
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 123
Gazette dated Monday, 25th August, 2014
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 49 OF 2014
The Public Health Act
(Laws, Volume 17, Cap. 295)
The Public Health (Notifiable Infectious and Formidable
Epidemic Disease) (Declaration) Notice, 2014
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in sections nine and twenty-
nine of the Public Health Act, the following Notice is hereby issued:
1. This Notice may be cited as the Public Health (Notifiable Title
Infectious and Formidable Epidemic Disease) (Declaration) Notice,
2014.
2. The disease specified in the Schedule is declared a notifiable Declaration
infectious and formidable epidemic disease. of notifiable
infectious,
formidable
epidemic
disease
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph 2)
Ebola Virus Disease (E.V.D)
J. KASONDE,
LUSAKA Minister of Health
22nd August, 2014
[MOH./101/1/93]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka, Price K1.00 each
124 Statutory Instruments 25th August, 2014
